name: Veechi
tag_list: socializedhr, veechi, job-genius, social-identity-report, resureader, social-recruiting, hr-crm
overview:
Veechi was formed in 2008 and has developed, deployed, and marketed an enterprise brand geared towards bridging the communication gap between job-seekers and employers.

SocializedHR: An enterprise brand under Veechi Corp is a suite of three recruiting products: (1) ResuReader, an iPhone based mobile recruiting app with a patent-pending ability to take a photograph of a paper resume and create structured data around it. (2) Social Identity Reports, which search, find and isolate employment oriented information related to job-seekers. (3) SocializedHR, an applicant tracking dashboard, which is an underlying database to manage job-seeker data. As first products in the vision, they help organizations zero-in on existing job-seekers. Veechiâ€™s products have been lauded by the HR community, with positive reviews coming from such heavy hitters as Futurestep, Bersin & Associates, and Bill Kutik. In May, 2011, an alliance with Taleo Corp was made public. Our products are now pre-integrated with Taleo Business Edition, the market-leading applicant tracking system (ATS).
